notes: Jan-Mar 2026 premiums: Main R2,822, Adult R2,227, Child R1,127

network_hospitals: Private hospitals in the Smart hospital network
exclusions: Skin disorders including benign growths and lipomas
Elective caesarean section (except if medically necessary)
Back and neck treatment or surgery
Cochlear implants and auditory brain implants
notes: Unlimited hospital cover in the Smart hospital network.
Cover for defined acute medicine categories prescribed by a Smart network GP.
Sports-related injuries: basic X-rays and specialist visits covered.

procedures.notes: Smart Day Surgery Network required. Out-of-network upfront payment of R12,650.
procedures.marketing_description: Gastroscopies on Classic Smart must use the Smart Day Surgery Network. A R12,650 upfront payment applies out-of-network.

jargon_busters.definition: The specific list of day clinics for Classic and Essential Smart plans.

faqs.question: Does my plan cover scopes?
faqs.answer: Yes, if performed in the Smart Day Surgery Network.

procedures.notes: Smart Day Surgery Network required. Out-of-network upfront payment of R12,650.
procedures.marketing_description: Colonoscopy cover requires use of the Smart Day Surgery Network. Out-of-network use incurs a R12,650 fee.

procedures.notes: Upfront payment: Members 13+ R8,950 (Hospital) / R5,750 (Day Clinic). Under 13 R3,470 (Hospital) / R1,550 (Day Clinic).
procedures.marketing_description: Classic Smart covers the rest of the hospital account from your Hospital Benefit for dental admissions, subject to an upfront payment.

modules.title: Personal Health Fund
modules.description: Day-to-day healthcare benefit with higher accumulation limits.

data.notes: Classic Smart members receive higher PHF accumulation limits.
